about_the_game:
The Accursed Crown of the Giant King, Chapter 3, "Citadel on the Wilderlands", follows the party out of civilization into the unsettled north.

"Wilderwatch Citadel stands on the border of the Wilderlands, guarding the Duchy of Northfell against unknown perils in unmapped lands. Your path lies north, into the wilderness, seeking the secrets of the menace of the Crown of the Giant King."
